data.title: Flashpoint From Mid Ramp Lower
data.description: This flashpoint not only blinds everyone peeking ramp but as well as the deepest angle that can see into the hallway of mid.

data.title: B Site Railing Flashpoint
data.description: This flashing point is fantastic as it lands in a spot the enemy will not be ready for making it a lot harder to dodge. As well as allowing you to fully peek without worrying about being blind from your own flash!
